name: AWS Cost Explorer Service
description:
You can use the Cost Explorer API to programmatically query your cost and usage data. You can query for aggregated data such as total monthly costs or total daily usage. You can also query for granular data. This might include the number of daily write operations for Amazon DynamoDB database tables in your production environment.

Service Endpoint

The Cost Explorer API provides the following endpoint:


-  `https://ce.us-east-1.amazonaws.com`   For information about the costs that are associated with the Cost Explorer API, see [Amazon Web Services Cost Management Pricing](http://aws.amazon.com/aws-cost-management/pricing/).
